title: Leveraging national forest inventory data to estimate forest carbon density status and trends for small areas
summary: This paper focuses on leveraging national forest inventory (NFI) data to estimate forest carbon density status and trends for small spatial and temporal domains, addressing challenges with sparse data in traditional design-based estimators.
